spec_summary: This 2018 Haas VF-3 is a high-performance vertical machining center designed for precision and efficiency.
upgrades: Probing System: Haas Wireless Intuitive Probing
maintenance: June 2023: Routine maintenance, spindle check, coolant flush
December 2022: Spindle bearing replacement, tool changer alignment
August 2022: Coolant system inspection, chip conveyor maintenance
March 2022: Lubrication system check, ball screw inspection
key_specs.inspection_notes: Last inspection June 2023 - Machine in good operational condition. Coolant system functioning properly.
potential_issues: Minor signs of wear on X-axis ball screw
Possible future replacement of way covers recommended
recommended_repairs: Monitor X-axis backlash for signs of progression
additional_notes: Used primarily for aluminum and stainless steel machining
No major crashes or collisions recorded
Good candidate for continued production or retrofit upgrades
key_specs.summary: Haas VF-3 with low hours, high spec upgrades, and excellent service history.
